agiletrack.swing

Class JDatePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • agiletrack.swing.JDatePicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JDatePicker
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Provides some surrounding UI to the JCalendar to allow the month and year to be changed, as well as selecting the date. It also provides an internal date change tracking to show a feedback background color indicating the date has change, or to be queried by other containers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DAYS_IN_MONTH_LIST

        private static int[] DAYS_IN_MONTH_LIST
        Number of days in each month. Used to adjust the day of the month near the boundary dates when switching the selected month.

      • JDatePicker

        public JDatePicker()

    • Method Detail

      • hasFocus

        public boolean hasFocus()
        See if any of the internal components has focus (and this the date picker itself).
        Overrides:
        hasFocus in class java.awt.Component
        Returns:
        true if any internal components have focus

      • updateCalendar

        private void updateCalendar()
        Update the calendar view. Get the selected month in the combo box, get the selected year in the spinner, and show the appropriate month in the JCalendar view.

      • updateCalendarHighlights

        private void updateCalendarHighlights()
        Highlight the currently selected date.

      • updateStatus

        private void updateStatus()
        Provide special background highlight color if the current selection is different from the original selection.

      • updateView

        private void updateView()
        Set the selected month in the combo box, and the selected year in the spinner. Update the calendar view to reflect the new selections, as well as the current date.

      • addActionListener

        public final void addActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Add an action listener. The JCalendar provides ActionEvents for clicks as well as for moving the mouse between date cells.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener object

      • removeActionListener

        public final void removeActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
        Remove an action listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener object

      • fireActionPerformed

        private final void fireActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)

      • isDateChanged

        public boolean isDateChanged()
        See if the current component date is different than the originally selected date.
        Returns:
        returns true if the date has changed

      • setOriginalDate

        public void setOriginalDate(java.util.Date date)
        Sets the originally selected date. This affects the isDateChanged() method, as well as special highlighting to indicate that the date has changed.
        Parameters:
        date - the originally selected date

      • setDate

        public void setDate(java.util.Date date)
        Sets the currently selected date. The calendar month and year UI is updated to reflect the date, and the JCalendar view itself displays the specified date as being highlighted selected.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be selected and highlighted in the UI

      • getDate

        public java.util.Date getDate()
        Get the currently selected date.
        Returns:
        return the currently selected date in the component, or null if no date is selected
